about_the_game:
Lovely, beautiful, terrifying hand drawn cosplay just in time for SDCC.

Pay actual money for these San Diego Comic-Con exclusive items that you'll probably never use! They are exclusive! Wait in super long lines for these! Are we at the point where the joke was either not funny to begin with or the dead horse is being beaten?

New outfits for every character.

To put on said costumes, just go to your hotel room:

- Choose COSPLAY.

- Choose SDCC 2018.
detailed_description:
Lovely, beautiful, terrifying hand drawn cosplay just in time for SDCC.

Pay actual money for these San Diego Comic-Con exclusive items that you'll probably never use! They are exclusive! Wait in super long lines for these! Are we at the point where the joke was either not funny to begin with or the dead horse is being beaten?

New outfits for every character.

To put on said costumes, just go to your hotel room:

- Choose COSPLAY.

- Choose SDCC 2018.
